#include<stdio.h>
int  main()
{
    int i,j,a,k,p;
   long long int m,n,sum;
    scanf("%lld",&n);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            a=1;
        j=1,k=0,sum=0;
            scanf("%lld",&m);
            while(a>=1)
            {
                a=m/(5*j);
                 sum+=a;
                j=j*5;
               k++;
            }
 
            printf("%lld\n",sum);
        }
 
    return 0;
}
